title: Add link to rating dashboard to user navigation
body_html:
Hey @mkalininait,

this adds a link to the rating dashboard to the user navigation, as described in #657. The link is displayed throughout all phases, I could not find a specification for something like a "rating phase" (cc @alicetragedy).

Be aware of the fact that the current implementation of the applications-table will probably not work with the current DB schema - and therefore break 💥 if you try to access it now.
body_text:
Hey @mkalininait,
this adds a link to the rating dashboard to the user navigation, as described in #657. The link is displayed throughout all phases, I could not find a specification for something like a "rating phase" (cc @alicetragedy).
Be aware of the fact that the current implementation of the applications-table will probably not work with the current DB schema - and therefore break 💥 if you try to access it now.
body:
Hey @mkalininait,

this adds a link to the rating dashboard to the user navigation, as described in #657. The link is displayed throughout all phases, I could not find a specification for something like a *"rating phase"* (cc @alicetragedy).

Be aware of the fact that the current implementation of the applications-table will probably not work with the current DB schema - and therefore break 💥 if you try to access it now.
